subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The former Notre Dame quarterback Demetrius Jones has enrolled at Cincinnati, where he will be eligible to run their no-huddle, spread offense next season. Jones started Notre Dame’s season opener against Georgia Tech and fumbled twice in a 33-3 defeat, the worst opening loss in Irish history. Last week, Notre Dame agreed to release Jones, a sophomore, from his scholarship as long as he transferred to a university that is not on its schedule.
